amendment.description: Amendment ensures that all taxpayer funds saved from elimination of the Home Affordable Modification Program (HAMP) are used to reduce the deficit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 112-34 to ensure that all taxpayer funds saved from elimination of the Home Affordable Modification Program (HAMP) are used to reduce the deficit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Canseco amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Canseco.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Canseco amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
